Text: So let's mine together \n again sometime, okay?
And I need to find a way \n to get back to \n Hekseville.
I don't dislike, I mean \n I don't hate, I mean-
Oh? \n Oh... Okay. \n Thanks Misai!

I still can't get over 
 that you're able to go 
 toe-to-toe with those 
 things. Impressive.
Cecie! I'll treat you to \n something too if you \n just leave it at that.

Okay, I'll just leave 
 the report here. Could 
 you give it to her when 
 she gets back?
What I was trying to say \n earlier was, uh-
O-Oh, could you hold on \n a sec? I had something \n to tell you...
S-Sure, you just relax \n and unwind after all \n that work.
You sounded like you had \n something else to say \n when we were talking...
Say, uh, Kat. Thanks for \n your help today.
Oh, uh, like I said, \n it's nothing.
Thanks!
I'm sorry, was I being a \n third wheel before? You \n were going to ask Kat-
I wish there was a way \n to thank you. How about \n I buy you a meal?
Misai, stay back. I'll \n mop 'em up for you.
Huh!?
That sounds great! \n I could use some food.
Where did all these \n Scarabs come from?
Uh, Misai? Kat already \n left to get cleaned up.
I'm sorry, Misai, I \n should've come faster.
It's a deal then.
Guess I'd better wash up \n first. I worked up a \n sweat out there.
Welcome back, Kat! \n Lisa's out right now.
It was my fault. I \n wasn't thinking.
Let's clean up here and \n go home!
Going back to what we \n were talking about \n earlier...
Thanks!
I still need to find the \n friend I was separated \n from...
I think someday I'll \n have to leave Banga.
Anytime you want to go \n out-uh, mining I mean. \n Just let me know.
Yeah, I kinda figured...
I'm all done surveying \n the mining site! Hm?
Hey, Kat, wanna help me \n survey a mining site?
It'll, uh, just be \n the two of us.
Sure, but what are \n you surveying?

We need data to figure 
 out how much ore we 
 can expect before we 
 begin mining.

Given the Scarab 
 problem, I usually head 
 out with a group for 
 safety.
But with you and your \n power, I think we could \n handle it ourselves.
Gotcha! That sounds \n more efficient too. \n Let's do it.
Y-You're cool with that? \n O-Okay, let's head out \n then.
So, how do we survey the \n ore deposits?

It's pretty much like 
 minin', but we go around 
 the sites and check the 
 ore composition.
First things first, take \n me over to an island \n with some ore.
Scarabs!
Can you whittle their \n numbers  down for us?
Then drop me off \n by an ore deposit.
Just don't leave me in \n the middle of a bunch \n of Scarabs, okay?
Don't worry! \n Even if I set you down, \n I'll come back for you.
Make sure you do!
Phew, that was \n an adrenaline rush.

I've gotta admit, 
 you make it easy to 
 get around even with 
 the Scarabs.
This Gravity Shifter is \n at your service!
I need to take some \n composition samples. \n Help a guy out?
Sure! I just need to \n mine the ore for \n you, right?
All done!
That was quick! Okay, \n next is that island over \n there.
Hate to ask, but should \n we be using up so much \n ore just for a survey?

Hm? Oh, it's fine. The 
 ore will grow back by 
 the time we come around 
 again.
Oh, wow, I didn't know \n it did that! You sure \n know your stuff.
I better, I've been at \n it for as long as I can \n remember.
Alright, let's move to \n the next island.
Got it! Next island, \n coming right up.
Hey! There's nothing \n left for me to mine.
Looks like I win the \n competition this time!

We're not out here for 
 fun, you know. Come on, 
 let's go to the next 
 island.
You've already got the \n samples? Nice job.
Yeah, though I had to \n take a few Scarabs down \n to get 'em.
I think we're good here, \n let's move to the next \n island.
Hmm, strange, there \n aren't any Scarabs \n around.
Don't jinx it. Would be \n nice to mine in peace \n for a change.
Good point...

If you don't mind me 
 askin', how long are you 
 planning on staying in 
 Banga?
What? You want me to \n leave or something?
N-No! That's not what I-
Banga really needs \n someone like you around.
And I... \n You see...
Hm?
Oh, uh, \n never mind, \n it's nothing.
Aww, come on, tell me. \n It'll drive me nuts if \n you don't.

We don't have time for 
 chatting, get to the 
 next island and start 
 mining!
That island way over \n there? You gonna be okay \n if I leave you here?
I'm fine! You were \n screwin' up my readings \n anyway...
I was?
Just get over there!
Alright, if you insist.
Misai: \n Thanks to you, we can pull this off without risking more people.
Glad to help!
Grab Misai and Escort Him \n to the Mining Area
Defeat the Scarabs \n Around the Ore
Misai: \n Hey, there's nothing left for me to survey!
Oh, sorry.
I dropped Misai!
Misai: \n The Scarabs are gone, take me over to an ore deposit.
That should do it. Better go get Misai.
Return to Misai
Misai: \n Take me over to where the ore is.
Escort Misai to the Ore
Mine for Gems
That should be enough. Better report to Misai!
I need to take Misai with me.
Take Misai to the Next Area
More Scarabs Misai!
Misai: \n Just put me down quick.
Mine the Ore
Misai: \n The Scarabs are gone, take me over to the ore.
That should do it. Better go get Misai.
Return to Misai
Misai: \n Take me over to where the ore is.
Take Misai to an Ore Deposit
That should be enough. Better report to Misai!
Alright, let's move on.
That island should be far enough away...
Head to the Mining Area
Too bad I throw off the survey readings.
Wonder what got into Misai all of a sudden.
Misai brings up a good question, how long will I be in Banga?
That should be enough, I should head back to Misai.
I have to take Misai.
Misai: \n Looks like no Scarabs here. Can you put me down?
I need to mine more.
Return to Misai
Oh, guess we have enough. Better report to Misai.
All done! Better go tell Misai.
Misai: \n Put me down in the middle.
I hope Misai's mood lightened a bit...
Misai: \n AAAH!
That was Misai!
Defeat the Scarabs
You're safe now, Misai.
I have to save Misai!
More of 'em, hang in there, Misai.
Gems Required
Misai!
I have to take Misai with me.
I shouldn't go too far from Misai.
Misai: \n Hey, leave some for me.
Misai: \n Scarabs, help!
Misai's in trouble...
Misai: \n I-I'm done for!
Wait there, Misai.
I have to save Misai from the Scarabs.
I have to put Misai down somewhere safer.
I can't let Misai get hurt...
I need to take Misai with me.
a : Put Misai Down
Misai: \n Could you put me down somewhere safer?
Misai!
I dropped Misai!
Misai: \n I've got this place covered, go mine somewhere else.
I have to get back to mining!
I have to get back to Misai.
I need to take Misai with me.
I have to take down those Scarabs!
I need to save Misai!
Misai: \n The Scarabs are all yours!
